data.comment: The match is underway at Stade de la Mosson.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Montpellier.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Free kick Montpellier.
In the minute 7, Aaron Leya Iseka (Metz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Junior Sambia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 9, Junior Sambia is back on his feet again.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Metz.
In the minute 10, At Stade de la Mosson, Metz are penalized for being offside.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Mosson.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In the minute 11, Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 13, Montpellier drive upfield and Mihailo Ristic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Metz defender.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Metz throw-in in Montpellier's half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in Metz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz attack but Kiki's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 19, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard awards Metz a goal kick.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
In the minute 23, Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Montpellier's Teji Savanier gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jeremie Pignard signals a Montpellier throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Montpellier.
Metz's Thomas Delaine is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Montpellier are in shooting range from this free kick.
Habib Maiga is booked for the away team.
In the minute 31, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 36, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Delaine for Metz has been booked by Jeremie Pignard and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Metz in the half of Montpellier.
Florent Mollet (Montpellier) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 41, In Montpellier, Farid Boulaya (Metz) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Jeremie Pignard awards Metz a goal kick.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
In the minute 45, Thomas Delaine for Metz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Montpellier.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
The first-half has come to a close in Montpellier.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Mosson.
Free kick Metz.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Aaron Leya Iseka gives Metz a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 51, Jeremie Pignard awards Metz a goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
In the minute 52, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Teji Savanier of Montpellier gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In the minute 54, Jeremie Pignard awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gaetan Laborde of Montpellier smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 60, Jeremie Pignard signals a Montpellier throw-in in Metz's half.
Free kick in a good position for Montpellier!
Andy Delort gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Opa Nguette is on a sub for Aaron Leya Iseka for Metz.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Stephy Mavididi (Montpellier) gets a yellow card.
In Montpellier Montpellier attack through Junior Sambia. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Metz at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier drives forward and Mihailo Ristic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 70, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Frederic Antonetti is making the team's second substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Pape Ndiaga Yade replacing Lamine Gueye.
In the minute 71, Montpellier to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Metz.
In the minute 76, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde has been booked in Montpellier.
Farid Boulaya (Metz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 77, Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
Metz pushes forward through Farid Boulaya, whose finish on goal is saved.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Yun Il-Lok is replacing Florent Mollet for the home team.
Montpellier make their second substitution with Petar Skuletic replacing Stephy Mavididi.
In the minute 80, Michel Der Zakarian (Montpellier) is making a third substitution, with Arnaud Souquet replacing Junior Sambia.
Throw-in high up the field for Montpellier in Montpellier.
Montpellier's Yun Il-Lok misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde breaks free at Stade de la Mosson. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Alexandre Oukidja for Metz is back on the field again.
The match at Stade de la Mosson has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alexandre Oukidja, who is down injured.
In the minute 84, Jeremie Pignard signals a Montpellier throw-in in Metz's half.
Montpellier are coming forward and Mihailo Ristic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jeremie Pignard awards Metz a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
The home team replace Gaetan Laborde with Sepe Elye Wahi.
Montpellier are pushing forward but Sepe Elye Wahi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 87, Metz have a goal kick.
Metz have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 89, In Montpellier Metz drive forward through Pape Ndiaga Yade. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Montpellier.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Montpellier's Keagan Dolly gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jeremie Pignard awards Metz a goal kick.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Jeremie Pignard blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
It's now 0-2 in Montpellier as Habib Maiga scores for Metz.
Pape Ndiaga Yade with an assist there.
The home team have replaced Teji Savanier with Keagan Dolly. This is the fifth substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
Victorien Angban is on a sub for Habib Maiga for Metz.
Vagner is replacing Farid Boulaya for Metz at Stade de la Mosson.
